page.title: 19DOING THE DOMESDAY PROJECT
page.content: We began by thinking about the original Domesday Book and why the Domesday Project was being done in 1985. We were given an area about four miles away from our school to survey for the Domesday Project.Although it was close, none of us had even heard of the villages there.It seemed very different to where we lived. First we went to have a general walk around the place and immediately found the local people very helpful.Then we made arrangements to visit particular people.We saw farmers,the vicar and ordinary residents.Everyone made us very welcome.They were interested in the project and wanted to know more. Next we took photographs and did our amenities count.Then we wrote about what we had seen and heard and finally put it all into the computer.
